MidTableTemplateSql.oracleOrder:
CREATE table YILING_ORDER ( ID NUMBER(12) not null,--
THIRD_CODE VARCHAR2(100) not null,-- 第三方公司订单编码
ORDER_ID NUMBER(12) not null,-- 订单ID
ORDER_NO VARCHAR2(32),-- 订单编码
ENTERPRISE_INNER_CODE VARCHAR2(100),-- 客户内码
ENTERPRISE_NAME VARCHAR2(100),-- 客户名称
SELLER_INNER_CODE VARCHAR2(100),-- 销售组织编码
SALE_INNER_CODE VARCHAR2(100),-- 销售员内码编码
ORDER_DATE DATE,-- 订单时间
RECEIVE_MOBILE VARCHAR2(100),-- 收货人电话号码
RECEIVE_USER VARCHAR2(100),-- 收货人名称
RECEIVE_ADDRESS VARCHAR2(100),-- 收货人地址
STATUS NUMBER(12),-- 订单状态 默认为0
REMARK VARCHAR2(200),-- 备注
CREATE_USER VARCHAR2(64),-- 创建人
CREATE_TIME DATE,-- 创建时间
UPDATE_USER VARCHAR2(64),-- 更新人
UPDATE_TIME DATE-- 更新时间
) tablespace USERS pctfree 10 initrans 1 maxtrans 255
ALTER table YILING_ORDER add constraint PK_ID primary key (ID) using index tablespace USERS pctfree 10 initrans 2 maxtrans 255
ALTER table YILING_ORDER add constraint IDX_ORDER_SN unique (ORDER_SN) using index tablespace USERS pctfree 10 initrans 2 maxtrans 255
-- 创建序列 CREATE sequence yiling_t_order_seq increment by 1 start with 1 nomaxvalue nominvalue nocache
-- 创建触发器 CREATE or replace trigger yiling_t_order_trig before insert on YILING_ORDER for each row begin select yiling_t_order_seq.nextval into :new.id from dual; end;
MidTableTemplateSql.oracleOrderDetail:
CREATE table YILING_ORDER_DETAIL ( ID NUMBER(11) not null,--
ORDER_ID NUMBER(11) null,-- 订单ID
ORDER_NO VARCHAR2(32) not null,-- 订单编号
THIRD_CODE VARCHAR2(100) not null,-- 第三方公司订单编码
ORDER_DETAIL_ID NUMBER(11) not null,-- 订单明细ID
SELLER_INNER_CODE VARCHAR2(100),-- 销售组织编码
GOODS_IN_SN VARCHAR2(100),-- 商品内码
GOODS_NAME VARCHAR2(100),-- 商品名称
BUY_NUMBER NUMBER(10,2),-- 购买数量
GOODS_PRICE NUMBER(10,2),-- 商品单价
GOODS_AMOUNT NUMBER(10,2),-- 商品小计
ENTERPRISE_INNER_CODE VARCHAR2(100)-- 客户内码
)-- 销售单明细 tablespace USERS
pctfree 10
initrans 1
maxtrans 255
ALTER table YILING_ORDER_DETAIL
add constraint YILING_IDD primary key (ID)
using index
tablespace USERS
pctfree 10
initrans 2
maxtrans 255
-- 创建序列
CREATE sequence yiling_t_order_detail_seq
increment by 1
start with 1
nomaxvalue
nominvalue
nocache
-- 创建触发器
CREATE or replace trigger yiling_t_order_detail_trig
before insert on YILING_ORDER_DETAIL
for each row
begin
select yiling_t_order_detail_seq.nextval into :new.id from dual;
end;
MidTableTemplateSql.mysqlOrder:
CREATE TABLE `rk_order` (
`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT "主键ID",
`su_id` int(4) NOT NULL COMMENT "商业公司ID",
`order_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT "订单ID",
`order_sn` varchar(64) NOT NULL COMMENT "订单号码",
`enterprise_code` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "客户内码",
`enterprise_name` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "客户名称",
`order_date` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "订单时间",
`goods_total_price` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "商品原价总金额",
`buy_total_price` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "购买总金额",
`pay_total_price` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "在线支付总金额",
`actual_total_price` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "实际支付总金额，减去所有优惠",
`shop_total_coupon` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "商家店铺优惠券金额",
`platform_total_coupon` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "平台优惠券金额",
`preferential_total_money` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "商家店铺满减金额",
`freight` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "订单运费",
`commission_money` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "佣金",
`pay_type` int(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "支付类型 1线上支付 ；0线下支付",
`courier_number` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "快递单号",
`courier_name` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "快递公司名称",
`order_status` int(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "订单状态0未发货1发货2取消",
`remark` varchar(256) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "备注",
`create_user` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "创建人",
`create_time` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "创建时间",
`update_user` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "更新人",
`update_time` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "更新时间",
PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
UNIQUE KEY `IDX_ORDER_CODE` (`order_sn`) USING BTREE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT="订单表";
MidTableTemplateSql.mysqlOrderDetail:
CREATE TABLE `rk_order_detail` (
`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT "主键ID",
`order_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT "订单ID",
`order_sn` varchar(64) NOT NULL COMMENT "订单编号",
`order_detail_id` int(11) NULL COMMENT "订单明细ID",
`su_id` int(4) NOT NULL COMMENT "商业公司ID",
`goods_in_sn` varchar(64) NOT NULL COMMENT "商品内码",
`goods_name` varchar(128) NOT NULL COMMENT "商品名称",
`buy_number` decimal(11,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "购买数量",
`delivery_number` decimal(11,2) DEFAULT 0 COMMENT "发货数量",
`goods_price` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "商品原单价",
`buy_price` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "购买单价",
`actual_price` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "实际支付单价，减去所有的优惠金额（有误差）",
`shop_coupon` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "商家店铺优惠券金额",
`platform_coupon` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "平台优惠券金额",
`preferential_money` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "商家店铺满减金额",
`is_coupon` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "是否特价0否1是",
PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT="订单详情表";
MidTableTemplateSql.sqlserverOrder:
CREATE TABLE [rk_order](
[id] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
[su_id] [int] NOT NULL,-- 商业公司ID
[order_id] [int] NOT NULL,-- 订单ID
[order_sn] [varchar](64) NOT NULL,-- 订单号
[enterprise_code] [varchar](64) NULL,-- 客户内码
[enterprise_name] [varchar](128) NULL,-- 客户名称
[order_date] [datetime] NULL,-- 订单时间
[goods_total_price] [decimal](10, 2) NULL,-- 商品原价总金额
[buy_total_price] [decimal](10, 2) NULL,-- 购买总金额
[pay_total_price] [decimal](10, 2) NULL,-- 在线支付总金额
[actual_total_price] [decimal](10, 2) NULL,-- 实际支付总金额，减去所有优惠
[shop_total_coupon] [decimal](10, 2) NULL,-- 商家店铺优惠券金额
[platform_total_coupon] [decimal](10, 2) NULL,-- 平台优惠券金额
[preferential_total_money] [decimal](10, 2) NULL,-- 商家店铺满减金额
[freight] [decimal](10, 2) NULL,-- 订单运费
[commission_money] [decimal](10, 2) NULL,-- 佣金
[pay_type] [int] NULL, -- 支付类型 1线上支付 ；0线下支付
[courier_number] [varchar](64) NULL,-- 快递单号
[courier_name] [varchar](64) NULL,-- 快递公司名称
[order_status] [int] NULL,-- 订单状态（0：未发货，1：已发货，2：已取消）
[remark] [varchar](256) NULL,-- 备注
[create_user] [varchar](64) NULL,-- 创建人
[create_time] [datetime] NULL,-- 创建时间
[update_user] [varchar](64) NULL,-- 更新人
[update_time] [datetime] NULL -- 更新时间
) ON [PRIMARY];
CREATE UNIQUE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [index_order_sn] ON [dbo].[rk_order]
(
[order_sn] ASC
)WITH (
PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF,
SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF,
DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF,
ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON,
ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON
) ON [PRIMARY];

CREATE TABLE [rk_order_detail](
[id] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
[order_id] [int] NULL,-- 订单ID
[order_sn] [varchar](64) NOT NULL,-- 订单号
[order_detail_id] [int] NULL,-- 订单明细ID
[su_id] [int] NULL,-- 商业公司ID
[goods_in_sn] [varchar](64) NOT NULL,-- 商品内码
[goods_name] [varchar](128) NOT NULL,-- 商品名称
[buy_number] [decimal](11, 2) NULL,-- 购买数量
[delivery_number] [decimal](11, 2) NULL,-- 发货数量
[goods_price] [decimal](10, 2) NULL,-- 商品原单价
[buy_price] [decimal](10, 2) NULL,-- 购买单价
[actual_price] [decimal](10, 2) NULL,-- 实际支付单价，减去所有的优惠金额（有误差）
[shop_coupon] [decimal](10, 2) NULL,-- 商家店铺优惠券金额
[platform_coupon] [decimal](10, 2) NULL,-- 平台优惠券金额
[preferential_money] [decimal](10, 2) NULL,-- 商家店铺满减金额
[is_coupon] [varchar](10) NULL-- 是否特价
) ON [PRIMARY]
